verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those וַיִּקְבְּצ֨וּ <WH6908> together פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <WH6430> that the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <WH4264> their armies לַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> for warfare לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> with Israel וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אָכִישׁ֙ <WH397> And Achish אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> unto David יָדֹ֣עַ <WH3045> Know תֵּדַ֗ע <WH3045> thou assuredly כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִתִּי֙ <WH854> that תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> that thou shalt go out בַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> with me to battle אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וַאֲנָשֶֽׁיךָ׃ <WH376> and your men

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אָכִ֔ישׁ <WH397> to Achish לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Surely אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you תֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> thou shalt know אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> can do עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> what thy servant וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אָכִישׁ֙ <WH397> And Achish אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> to David לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> well שֹׁמֵ֧ר <WH8104> thee keeper לְרֹאשִׁ֛י <WH7218> of mine head אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <WH7760> Therefore will I make כָּל־ <WH3605> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever פ

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> Now Samuel מֵ֔ת <WH4191> was dead וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> had lamented לוֹ֙ כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and all Israel וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <WH6912> him and buried בָרָמָ֖ה <WH7414> him in Ramah וּבְעִיר֑וֹ <WH5892> even in his own city וְשָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And Saul הֵסִ֛יר <WH5493> had put away הָאֹב֥וֹת <WH178> those that had familiar spirits וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖ים <WH3049> and the wizards מֵהָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> out of the land

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> gathered themselves together פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> And the Philistines וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְשׁוּנֵ֑ם <WH7766> in Shunem וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <WH6908> together שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> and Saul אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> all Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and they pitched בַּגִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> in Gilboa

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> And when Saul אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיִּרָ֕א <WH3372> he was afraid וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <WH2729> trembled לִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> and his heart מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly

וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> enquired שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And when Saul בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָנָ֖הוּ <WH6030> answered יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD גַּ֧ם <WH1571> either בַּחֲלֹמ֛וֹת <WH2472> him not neither by dreams גַּ֥ם <WH1571> or בָּאוּרִ֖ים <WH224> nor by Urim גַּ֥ם <WH1571> or בַּנְּבִיאִֽם׃ <WH5030> nor by prophets

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> Saul לַעֲבָדָ֗יו <WH5650> unto his servants בַּקְּשׁוּ־ <WH1245> Seek לִי֙ אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> me a woman בַּעֲלַת־ <WH1172> that hath א֔וֹב <WH178> a familiar spirit וְאֵלְכָ֥ה <WH1980> may go אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> about וְאֶדְרְשָׁה־ <WH1875> to her and enquire בָּ֑הּ וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> of her And his servants אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> to him Behold [there is] a woman בַּֽעֲלַת־ <WH1172> that hath א֖וֹב <WH178> a familiar spirit בְּעֵ֥ין דּֽוֹר׃ <WH5874> at Endor

וַיִּתְחַפֵּ֣שׂ <WH2664> disguised שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And Saul וַיִּלְבַּשׁ֙ <WH3847> himself and put on בְּגָדִ֣ים <WH899> raiment אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went ה֗וּא <WH1931> he וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> and two אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> men עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> and they וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> with him and they came אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> to the woman לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said [קָסֹומִי־ כ] (קָֽסֳמִי־ <WH7080> Conjure נָ֥א <WH7080> I pray thee divine ק) לִי֙ בָּא֔וֹב <WH178> unto me by the familiar spirit וְהַ֣עֲלִי <WH5927> and bring me [him] up לִ֔י אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אֹמַ֖ר <WH559> whom I shall name אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH413> about

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> And the woman אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH3045> unto him Behold thou knowest אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> hath done שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> what Saul אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> how הִכְרִ֛ית <WH3772> how he hath cut off אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹב֥וֹת <WH178> those that have familiar spirits וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖י <WH3049> and the wizards מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וְלָמָ֥ה <WH4100> Why אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you מִתְנַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH5367> wherefore then layest thou a snare בְּנַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> for my life לַהֲמִיתֵֽנִי׃ <WH4191> to cause me to die

וַיִּשָּׁ֤בַֽע <WH7650> sware לָהּ֙ שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to her by the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD אִֽם־ <WH518> there shall יִקְּרֵ֥ךְ <WH7136> happen עָוֹ֖ן <WH5771> no punishment בַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> to thee for this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> Then said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> the woman אֶת־ <WH853> מִ֖י <WH4310> Whom אַֽעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> Whom shall I bring up לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> unto thee? And he said אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> Samuel הַֽעֲלִי־ <WH5927> Bring me up לִֽי׃

וַתֵּ֤רֶא <WH7200> saw הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And when the woman אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <WH2199> she cried בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> with a loud וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> spake הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <WH802> and the woman אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֧וּל <WH7586> to Saul לֵאמֹ֛ר <WH559> saying לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why רִמִּיתָ֖נִי <WH7411> Why hast thou deceived וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> me? for thou [art] Saul

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said לָ֥הּ הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְאִ֖י <WH3372> unto her Be not afraid כִּ֣י <WH3588> but מָ֣ה <WH4100> what רָאִ֑ית <WH7200> for what sawest וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> thou? And the woman אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> unto Saul אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I saw עֹלִ֥ים <WH5927> ascending מִן־ <WH4480> out הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> out of the earth

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָהּ֙ מַֽה־ <WH4100> to her What תָּאֳר֔וֹ <WH8389> unto her What form וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> [is] he of? And she said אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man זָקֵן֙ <WH2205> An old עֹלֶ֔ה <WH5927> cometh up וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he עֹטֶ֖ה <WH5844> and he [is] covered מְעִ֑יל <WH4598> with a mantle וַיֵּ֤דַע <WH3045> perceived שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And Saul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that it was שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <WH8050> that it [was] Samuel ה֔וּא <WH1931> and he וַיִּקֹּ֥ד <WH6915> and he stooped אַפַּ֛יִם <WH639> with [his] face אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <WH7812> and bowed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> to Saul לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why הִרְגַּזְתַּ֖נִי <WH7264> Why hast thou disquieted לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> me to bring me up אֹתִ֑י <WH853> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered שָׁ֠אוּל <WH7586> ? And Saul צַר־ <WH6887> distressed לִ֨י מְאֹ֜ד <WH3966> I am sore וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים ׀ <WH6430> for the Philistines נִלְחָמִ֣ים <WH3898> make war בִּ֗י וֵֽאלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> against me and God סָ֤ר <WH5493> is departed מֵֽעָלַי֙ <WH5921> and וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no עָנָ֣נִי <WH6030> from me and answereth ע֗וֹד <WH5750> longer גַּ֤ם <WH1571> either בְּיַֽד־ <WH3027> me no more neither by הַנְּבִיאִם֙ <WH5030> prophets גַּם־ <WH1571> or בַּ֣חֲלֹמ֔וֹת <WH2472> nor by dreams וָאֶקְרָאֶ֣ה <WH7121> therefore I have called לְךָ֔ לְהוֹדִיעֵ֖נִי <WH3045> thee that thou mayest make known מָ֥ה <WH4100> what אֶעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto me what I shall do ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel וְלָ֖מָּה <WH4100> Why תִּשְׁאָלֵ֑נִי <WH7592> Wherefore then dost thou ask וַיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of me seeing the LORD סָ֥ר <WH5493> is departed מֵעָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and has וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become עָרֶֽךָ׃ <WH6145> enemy

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> hath done יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> to him as he spake בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> by me וַיִּקְרַ֨ע <WH7167> hath rent יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> the kingdom מִיָּדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> out of thine hand וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <WH5414> and given לְרֵעֲךָ֥ <WH7453> it to thy neighbour לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [even] to David

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH8085> thou obeyedst בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> not the voice יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not עָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> nor executedst חֲרוֹן־ <WH2740> his fierce אַפּ֖וֹ <WH639> wrath בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> upon Amalek עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this עָשָֽׂה־ <WH6213> done לְךָ֥ יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> therefore hath the LORD הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto thee this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְיִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> will also deliver יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> Moreover the LORD גַּ֣ם <WH1571> will also אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Israel עִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> along בְּיַד־ <WH3027> with thee into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וּמָחָ֕ר <WH4279> and to morrow אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> [shalt] thou and thy sons עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> along גַּ֚ם <WH1571> Indeed אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the host יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> also shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [be] with me the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> straightway שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Then Saul וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> fell מְלֹא־ <WH4393> all קֽוֹמָתוֹ֙ <WH6967> along אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> on the earth וַיִּרָ֥א <WH3372> afraid מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> and was sore מִדִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> because of the words שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <WH8050> of Samuel גַּם־ <WH1571> also כֹּ֙חַ֙ <WH3581> and there was no strength לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֣יָה <WH1961> become ב֔וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> no אָכַל֙ <WH398> in him for he had eaten לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> no bread כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> all the day וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> nor all the night

וַתָּב֤וֹא <WH935> came הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And the woman אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> unto Saul וַתֵּ֖רֶא <WH7200> and saw כִּי־ <WH3588> for נִבְהַ֣ל <WH926> troubled מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> that he was sore וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold שָׁמְעָ֤ה <WH8085> hath obeyed שִׁפְחָֽתְךָ֙ <WH8198> unto him Behold thine handmaid בְּקוֹלֶ֔ךָ <WH6963> thy voice וָאָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> and I have put נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> my life בְּכַפִּ֔י <WH3709> in my hand וָֽאֶשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> and have hearkened אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <WH1697> unto thy words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH1696> which thou spakest אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now שְׁמַֽע־ <WH8085> Now therefore I pray thee hearken נָ֤א <WH4994> please גַם־ <WH1571> also אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> thou also unto the voice שִׁפְחָתֶ֔ךָ <WH8198> of thine handmaid וְאָשִׂ֧מָה <WH7760> and let me set לְפָנֶ֛יךָ <WH6440> before פַּת־ <WH6595> a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> of bread וֶאֱכ֑וֹל <WH398> thee and eat וִיהִ֤י <WH1961> and have בְךָ֙ כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> that thou mayest have strength כִּ֥י <WH3588> when תֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> go בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> on thy way
